name: Grab (itch)
description:
The heist of the century!

Put on your mask and become a super corgi in this thrilling heist adventure! You plummet down a building at light speed, grabbing everything valuable at your sight.

Collect power modules to power your hook and crush through platforms to speed up your journey.

Controller recommended!

If you are on Windows, you might get the following prompt:

Just click on "More info" and then "Run anyway"

If you are on MacOS, you might get the following:

To resolve this, go to your System Settings -> Security / Privacy and click on Open


Bug-patched versions can be found at:

  • Windows
  • MacOS
  • Linux
